annotation: Kirsten Marie starts her third session with this short, humorous folk saying. It was never published, possibly because Tang Kristensen considered it off-color.
danish_manuscript: Det røger sa Ræven i den fer i Spånen
english_manuscript: It's smoking said the Fox as it farted in the bucket.
english_publication: Unpublished version reads: It’s smoking said the Fox as it farted in the bucket.
